meta.description: Determine the optimal number of 4-wheeler and 3-wheeler vehicles to minimize the total number of vehicles while meeting luggage movement and pollution constraints.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles available for purchase

params.name: luggage_capacity
params.description: Luggage capacity per vehicle type per day

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced per vehicle type per day

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of vehicles to purchase of each type

objective.name: min_total_vehicles
objective.description: Minimize the total number of vehicles purchased

constraints.name: luggage_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1000 luggage can be moved per day

constraints.name: pollution_limit
constraints.description: Ensure pollution does not exceed 430 units per day
